title: Feature or Mistake?
body: I logged into league of legends today to check to see if i had my ranked rewards, being that i was silver i wasnt expecting much just an icon and the border but when i checked my summoner icons i saw that i had all stars 2016 which confused me. i checked the store to see if it was on sale or something but it wasnt there. I did participate in the impact challenge and i am currently sporting the icon from that event. Is it also an added bonus that you get the all stars icon for free? just to be sure i wasnt going crazy i went on a seperate acc i have that didnt participate in the impact challenge and it had its ranked rewards but not the all star icon

replies.body: The All-star icon is for participating in the voting, and there's no bonus or other way to receive it.  Check out the [voting page](http://www.lolesports.com/en_US/all-star/results/na-lcs/toplane) and see if you have anyone selected as "Your pick."  You may have voted at some point, I can't really say for sure!  In any case, grats on that!  :D
oh okay that makes sense thanks for clearing it up i was confused on how it got there.
